__TOC__
==Notes==
The Mesozoic Lands is a [[Dungeon]] filed with tribal warriors, dinosaurs, and more! 
* It is located on the North side of the mountain range found on [[Booty Island]]
* While this dungeon can be reached from [[Magincia]], you may be best off visiting your local rune library for a rune!
* Creatures here have special abilities and have a different loot system.
* Majority of creatures in this dungeon do not drop gold but instead will drop "raw dino ribs"
* Every creature inside the main dungeon has a chance to drop "raw dino ribs"


[[File:Dinomeats.png|400px|Dino Meat Loot]]

==Main Area - The Charred Summit==
[[File:Mesozioc lands dungeon map.png|425px|thumb|right|Mesozioc Lands Map]]
The Entrance of Mesozoic Lands leads to the Charred Summit where the air is thick with the scent of sulfur, distant roars echo through the rocky terrain, hinting at the presence of formidable creatures. This valley is very large and there are caves leading to caverns and areas such as:
* The Tar Pits
* Primordial Swamps
* Bone Cavern
* Allosaurus Falls
* The Inner Chamber

===Meat Altars===
Beware adventurers, within Inner Chamber in the South East area the [[Dungeon_Bosses#Amenemhete|Amenemhete]] can be found! He is one of the many [[Dungeon_Bosses|Dungeon Bosses]] that inhabit the lands of Sosaria.
* To unlock the Inner Chamber to the Charred Summit you must fill the meat altars with "raw dino ribs"
* There are 8 altars that require a total of 20 "raw dino ribs"
* While the meat is in your backpack, double click your meat while standing near the altar to stuff it into the altar

[[File:Meataltar.png|400px|Meat Altar]]


Once all 20 pieces of raw dino ribs have been stuffed into the altars the boulders will clear and you can gain entry into the Inner Chamber.


==North - Bone Cavern==

Bone Cavern is the cave furthest north from the Mesozoic Lands entrance characteristically marked with two very large dinosaur rib cage bones.

==North East - The Tar Pits==

The Tar Pits are a collection of black rocks located along the north side of the mountain range inside The Charred Summit just east of the entrance.
